name: Pangaea (Pirhana)
description:
Game made for GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours. A short world-builder game about joining pieces together to increase the value of your world!

Controls:
- Move with WASD, or the arrow keys.
- Place the next tile with SPACE.

Credits :
- Programming, Art, Design - Pirhana
- Music, SFX, Design - MajorBruno
